switch.name: systems/refuel-pump-cmd
switch.test: fcs/refueling-pos-norm == 1

switch.name: systems/refuel-pump
switch.test: systems/refuel-pump-cmd == 1 /systems/electrical/outputs/refuel-pump > 27

switch.name: Refuel Air
switch.test: /systems/refuel/contact == 1 /position/altitude-agl-ft gt 100 fcs/refueling-pos-norm == 1 systems/refuel-pump == 1

switch.name: Refuel Ground
switch.test: /position/altitude-agl-ft lt 7 systems/refuel-pump == 1

switch.name: systems/refueling_action
switch.test: systems/refueling_air == 1 systems/refueling_ground == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel0
switch.test: propulsion/tank[2]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs lt 13770

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel1
switch.test: propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs gt 0 fcs/fuel-pump0 == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel2
switch.test: propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs gt 0 fcs/fuel-pump0 == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel3
switch.test: propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs gt 0 fcs/fuel-pump0 == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel4
switch.test: propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs gt 0 fcs/fuel-pump0 == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel5
switch.test: propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs gt 0 fcs/fuel-pump0 == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel6
switch.test: propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs gt 0 fcs/fuel-pump0 == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel7

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel8
switch.test: propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs == 0 fcs/fuel-pump0 == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel9
switch.test: propulsion/tank[0]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs == 0 fcs/fuel-pump0 == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel12
switch.test: propulsion/tank[1]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs gt 0 fcs/fuel-pump1 == 1

switch.name: trash/fuelrefuel15
switch.test: propulsion/tank[1]/contents-lbs lt 200 propulsion/tank[8]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[9]/contents-lbs == 0 propulsion/tank[3]/contents-lbs gt 0 propulsion/tank[5]/contents-lbs gt 0 fcs/fuel-pump1 == 1
